class.name: jsk_topic_tools/VitalCheckerNodelet
class.description: check ~input is alive or not and publish the status into /diagnostics. ~title parameter is required.

class.name: jsk_topic_tools/HzMeasure
class.description: subscribe ~input topic and publish the rate of the messages to ~output as std_msgs/Float32.

class.name: jsk_topic_tools/LightweightThrottle
class.description: lightweight throttle nodelet. Publish ~output from ~input with the fixed rate specified by ~update_rate parameter.

class.name: jsk_topic_tools/MUX
class.description: mux nodelet. Publish ~output from the list of the topics listed on ~topics parameters. It supports all the API of topic_tools/mux, so you can use mux_select, mux_add, mux_delete, mux_list of topic_tools.

class.name: jsk_topic_tools/Relay
class.description: relay a topic message from ~input to ~output.

class.name: jsk_topic_tools/DeprecatedRelay
class.description: relay a topic message from ~input to ~output with deprecated message.

class.name: jsk_topic_tools/Passthrough
class.description: passthrough a topic message from ~input to ~output during specified time.
